name: Hard Days Night Hotel
description:
An example for web design/prototyping class on process of building a site - wireframe, mood boards and design. In class, we conducted a design thinking session and broke off into teams. These are the examples I walked them through as they began planning a similar type of site.


The next step will be building a reservation system that will include various options for tourism as well as staying at the hotel. This segment of the overall project focuses on UX/UI in terms of research, build and design.
